## bind_arc_map_data

## Description
 Bind map bindings for arc map 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_arc_map_data( 
  ., 
  regions_data = NULL, 
  regions_geometry = NULL, 
  routes_data = NULL, 
  routes_source_code = NULL, 
  routes_target_code = NULL, 
  routes_arc_width = NULL, 
  routes_arc_filter = NULL, 
  routes_arc_color_category = NULL, 
  routes_arc_add_to_popup_panel = NULL, 
  locations_data = NULL, 
  locations_code = NULL, 
  locations_name = NULL, 
  locations_latitude = NULL, 
  locations_longitude = NULL, 
  locations_color_category = NULL, 
  locations_add_to_popup_panel = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| regions_data | Regions `sf` data frame. |
| regions_geometry | Regions geometry column. |
| routes_data | Data frame for arc routes |
| routes_source_code | Route source code. Code must match location_code. |
| routes_target_code | Route target code. Code must match location_code. |
| routes_arc_width | Width of arc |
| routes_arc_filter | Filter arc by column |
| routes_arc_color_category | Color arc by category |
| routes_arc_add_to_popup_panel | Add data to arc popup. |
| locations_data | Data frame for locations |
| locations_code | Location code. Must match source or target code in routes dataset. |
| locations_name | Location name. |
| locations_latitude | Location latitude (X axis). |
| locations_longitude | Location longitude (Y axis). |
| locations_color_category | Location color category. |
| locations_add_to_popup_panel | Add data to location popup. |
